text: Roberto Arioldi (born 29 November 1955) is an Italian equestrian. He competed in two events at the 2004 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Italy Category:Equestrians at the 2004 Summer Olympics Category:Competitors at the 1997 Mediterranean Games Category:Competitors at the 2005 Mediterranean Games Category:Sportspeople from Monza Category:Mediterranean Games medalists in equestrian Category:Mediterranean Games gold medalists for Italy Category:Mediterranean Games silver medalists for Italy
title: Roberto Arioldi
